slogan.description:
StreamX 的初衷是为了让流处理更简单.
 打造一个一站式大数据平台,流批一体,湖仓一体的解决方案

feature.title: 源码可控
feature.details: 高质量的代码,重要步骤注释清晰,后端代码通过阿里代码规范检查,前端代码全部经过eslint语法的严格检验,保证可读性和健壮性

feature.title: 简单易用
feature.details: StreamX 的初衷是为了让流处理更简单,提供了一系列快捷api和Connector,开箱即用,让开发者更方便快速的开发

feature.title: 文档详尽
feature.details: 从概念到上手再到进阶高级,每个使用细节和注意事项都详细罗列,文档通俗易懂拒绝复杂概念,并辅助大量代码示例,让开发者一目了然

feature.title: 健壮稳定
feature.details: 大数据领域资深玩家打造,每个API,每处设计都经过精心打磨,测试用例齐全,经历线上项目验证,保证稳定可靠

feature.title: 流批一体
feature.details: StreamX 以 Flink & Spark 为底层框架,让流批一体落地更加简单,连接互通,跨越框架间的屏障,创造更多可能性

feature.title: 一站式解决方案
feature.details: StreamX集成了项目编译,发布,参数配置,任务监控,在线IDE等众多功能于一身,是一个一站式综合数据平台

scaffold.title: 编写代码
scaffold.description: 使用 streamx 快速开始开发代码

scaffold.title: 调式代码
scaffold.description: 传入约定的任务配置,开始本地代码调式

scaffold.title: 部署任务
scaffold.description: 使用streamx-console部署任务和管理任务

slogan.description: The original intention of StreamX is to make stream processing easier. Create a one-stop big data platform, a solution that integrates batch flow and integrated storage and storage

feature.title: Code controllable
feature.details: High-quality code, the back-end code has passed the Ali code specification inspection, and the front-end code has been strictly inspected by eslint syntax to ensure readability and robustness

feature.title: Easy to use
feature.details: The original intention of StreamX is to make stream processing simpler, simplify the complex, and use it out of the box to make development work more convenient.

feature.title: Complete docs
feature.details: From concept to getting started and then to advanced advanced level, each use detail is listed in detail, and a large number of code examples are assisted, so that developers can see at a glance

feature.title: Robust and stable
feature.details: Created by experienced players in the big data field, each API and design have been carefully polished, complete test cases, and verified by online projects to ensure stability and reliability

feature.title: Batch & Streaming
feature.details: StreamX uses Flink & Spark as the underlying framework to make streaming batch integration easier, connecting and interoperating, crossing barriers, and creating more possibilities

feature.title: One-stop solution
feature.details: StreamX integrates project compilation, release, parameter configuration, task monitoring, online IDE and many other functions in one, and it is a one-stop comprehensive data platform

scaffold.title: Write code
scaffold.description: Start developing code quickly using the streamx

scaffold.title: Debug code
scaffold.description: Pass in the job configuration,Start the job and quickly debug the code

scaffold.title: Deployment Job
scaffold.description: Deployment job to streamx-console to facilitate and quickly manage job
